price: Na bila ya shaka Sisi tumeifanya Qur'ani iwe nyepesi kufahamika. Lakini yupo anaye kumbuka?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
footnotes: Ninaapa, tumeifanya Qur'ani iwe sahali kukumbukwa na kutoa mawaidha. Lakini je, yupo wa kuwaidhika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
